mapper.sql: view_id, user_number, view_name, view_time, view_photo, view_desc
mapper.select:
select * from view_info
and view_name like #{viewName}
mapper.insert:
insert into view_info
view_id,
user_number,
view_name,
view_time,
view_photo,
view_desc,
#{viewId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{viewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{viewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{viewPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update view_info
user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
view_name = #{viewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
view_time = #{viewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
view_photo = #{viewPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
view_desc = #{viewDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where view_id = #{viewId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update view_info set user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, view_name = #{viewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, view_time = #{viewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, view_photo = #{viewPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, view_desc = #{viewDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where view_id = #{viewId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
